sentences.en: Accounts receivable comprise the largest financial asset of many merchandising companies.
sentences.cn: 在很多商业公司内,应收账款已成为公司最主要的资产构成.

sentences.en: Are there other merchandising Methods: Used in the mass accounts?
sentences.cn: 大型零售渠道中使用的其他销售规划形式?

sentences.en: Bulk merchandising of products to achieve maximum impact at a competitive price.
sentences.cn: 大量陈列某商品,并以极具竞争力的价格来取得最大效果.

sentences.en: Character merchandising involves the use of fictional characters, names, other symbols and etc. in the marketing.
sentences.cn: 角色商品化包括作品虚构形象 、 名称 以及 其他标识等角色元素的商业化利用形式.

sentences.en: Company executives say revamped merchandising should help Macy's earnings to grow.
sentences.cn: 公司主管说销售规划改进后应该能够帮助梅西公司提高收益。

sentences.en: For now, low - price retailers are readjusting their merchandising and pricing.
sentences.cn: 现在, 低价格的零售商都在调整自己的销售规划和定价.

sentences.en: III. Experience in merchandising function or marketing function in retail or FMCG is preferred.
sentences.cn: 有零售业或快速消费品行业采购或市场工作经验更佳.

sentences.en: millions of pounds' worth of Batman merchandising
sentences.cn: 价值数百万英镑的《蝙蝠侠》的衍生产品

sentences.en: Oversees the selling team merchandising of the departments to ensure company standards are achieved.
sentences.cn: 确保店内的商品陈列符合公司的运营标准.

sentences.en: Programme tickets are available for sale or redemption at all Merchandising Centres.
sentences.cn: 课程门券现已于各购货中心公开发售及换购.

sentences.en: The club says it will make increasing amounts from merchandising.
sentences.cn: 俱乐部称会从衍生商品中获得越来越多的利润。

sentences.en: Thus , merchandising businesses generally use the accrual basis.
sentences.cn: 销售企业一般采用权责发生制为基础.

sentences.en: Toys and other tie - in movie merchandising grossed a ground total of 9 billion US dollars.
sentences.cn: 玩具以及其他与电影相关的商品的销售总值超过了90亿美元.

sentences.en: We are selling the full range of World Cup merchandising.
sentences.cn: 我们出售世界杯的所有纪念商品。

sentences.en: Where the Spice Girls really, really came into their own was in marketing and merchandising.
sentences.cn: 辣妹们真正大红大紫是在市场销售上.

trans.tran_en: the way in which shops and businesses try to sell their products
